Package physics

Interface RigidBody

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Arena, ArenaBody, EnemyPlayer, GameObjectWithPhysics, MainPlayer, Player, PlayerBody, Puck, PuckBody
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPlayer, ArenaBodyImpl, ArenaImpl, EnemyPlayerImpl, MainPlayerImpl, PlayerBodyImpl, PuckBodyImpl, PuckImpl, RigidBodyImpl
    public interface RigidBody
    Interface describing a rigid body. It is a wrapper around the JBox2D body with added functionalities.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      org.jbox2d.dynamics.Body getBody()
      Get the body of the RigidBody
      org.jbox2d.common.Vec2 getPosition()  
      void resetBodyPos()
      Reset the body position to the start position.
      void setPosition​(org.jbox2d.common.Vec2 pos)
      set the body in a position and resets the speed of the object.

    • Method Detail

      • getBody

        Get the body of the RigidBody
        Returns:

      • getPosition

        org.jbox2d.common.Vec2 getPosition()
        Returns:
        The Body position.

      • setPosition

        void setPosition​(org.jbox2d.common.Vec2 pos)
        set the body in a position and resets the speed of the object.
        Parameters:
        pos - The position to set the object to.

      • resetBodyPos

        void resetBodyPos()
        Reset the body position to the start position.
